name: Dragon Evolution (itch)
description:
Game made for ScoreSpace Jam #24

Made by: 

  • RMrando 
  • Jonno - jonnoxvii

Goal of the game is to protect the dragon egg from wolves. You kill wolves and bring their meat to the egg and help the dragon evolve.

You move around bit orbiting around the middle.

[A] and [D] to move clockwise and counterclockwise.

[W] and [S] to move closer and further from the middle.

[Left Mouse Button] to Attack and pick up food.

(Currently if it seems like you  can pick up food you might already have one on you so go up to the dragon and click on it and then you can pick up another piece of food.)
